node.html: HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate (003) - Certification demonstrating expertise in Infrastructure as Code tools and best practices for developing efficient, secure, and scalable infrastructure.
AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner - Foundational level certification demonstrating fundamental understanding of IT services and their uses in the AWS Cloud.
Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate - 8-course program covering data preparation, analysis, and visualization using tools like SQL, Tableau, and R.
